CAREER   OBJECTIVE

managing the area independently having excellent administrative and 
commercial abilities with a highly focused rational approach.
WORK EXPERIENCE
Company Profile:M/S. Transport Corporation Of India  
Ltd.
TCI Group is India’s Largest and most respected Supply Chain 
Management Group with annual revenues of Rs.3000 Crores and
Over 1200 offices across India. A TCI Group having Fleet of 3500
Trucks, Container, Reefer, Vehicles and Volvo and also having
A Fleet of 04 Ships.
I have worked in the following fields in: M/s.Transport Corporation Of India  
Ltd:- 16 Years Experience In Transportation and Logistics. 
Presently working (TCI LTD, Jamalpur Gurgaon) from July 2013 to Till

Punjab) in 2005-2009.
Worked as Hub- Supervisor (Transshipment, Hajipur, Patna) in 2003-2005.
Worked as Assistant in Booking and Delivery (NASIK) in 2000-2003.
JOB Responsibilities
     
Presently  working  as  Executive Operations in Jamalpur 
Gurgaon.

Route operation.

Planning of Route for All India Dispatch.
Check out proper documentation and permit enclose with docket .
Handle Branch Billing and Outstanding.
Manage Fleet as per requirement by our Customer.
Ensuring accurate and timely deliveries at the lowest cost
Billing & Collection follow up for payment.
Cost Analysis of Consignment wise (Sundry, LTL, FTL and ODC)
Also responsible for overall operational activities .
Fleet and Traffic Control.
Project Work:-SONALIKA TRACTORS LTD HOSHIARPUR
Entire Milk Run activity.
Co-ordination with customer / supplier for pick-ups and deliveries of line haul
materials.
To ensure excess quantity should not be accumulated at line haul.
Giving Requirements to supplier for next day pick-up. On daily basic.
New Route development for cost management and reduction of transit time 
for customer to enhance operational activity.    
Genratation of M.I.S, Such as  Stock Report, & vehicle performance report 
circulate to all vendor & as per requirement of management.
